name: Policy Sonar s.r.l.
goal: Legislative monitoring activities, assessment of regulatory impact, political risk analysis, strategic consulting, strategic comunication
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Circular Economy Package, which includes revised legislative proposals on waste to stimulate Europe's transition towards a circular economy which will boost global competitiveness, foster sustainable economic growth and generate new jobs
